blog.description: This blog is all about my animation  and some latest updates about my future projects. I will also reblog and point out other things from animation related material that I think is ineresting.

summary: I made a mockup image that showcases what I envision the visual style of my senior film to be like. Once again this is a mockup....
caption:
I made a mockup image that showcases what I envision the visual style of my senior film to be like. Once again this is a mockup. These are not actual frames of animation from the film. I’m shooting for a Cinecolor look for this project now.

Tito and Old Tortoise © SteLomation 2018

summary:
I am taking commisions! Kind of...
I will paint you a small painting if you advertise me and pay shipping. I am trying to learn...
body:
I am taking commisions! Kind of…

I will paint you a small painting if you advertise me and pay shipping. I am trying to learn how to use watercolor and guache so this is what i am gonna do!

Rules, it gotta be halloween theme. If you give me an idea, i may take creative freedom. This person asked for a raven and a skull…

summary:
Seremos un paisaje.
Cuando mi cabeza se vacíe de memorias, te buscaré en la fuerza con la que cae una tormenta y recordaré por...
body:
Seremos un paisaje.

Cuando mi cabeza se vacíe de memorias, te buscaré en la fuerza con la que cae una tormenta y recordaré por qué te admiré tanto.

Cuando me lamente porque te hayas marchado contemplaré como demuelen el más alto edificio para construir uno renovado y aún más alto. Y lograré consolarme.

Y al ver el deterioro de todo lo que me rodea no sabré muy bien por qué sigo aquí. Entonces iré al lugar que concebimos por hogar, el hogar que tú me regalaste. Y jamás querré marcharme.

Y seremos un paisaje

porque estarás en cada ocasion en la que pare el mundo

para observarlo con delicadeza.

Fan Art tag: #InterstellacticFanArt

ALL PORN BLOGS/BOTS WILL BE IGNORED AND BLOCKED!!!

Howdy! I'm Wicke [pronounced as "wick" the "e" is silent]. I go by they/them or she/her pronouns.

OC Ask/RP Blog: @interstellactic-oc-ask

Other Blog: @interstellactic-studios-random

Batim Blog: @ask-astral-and-the-space-gang

I'm a teenaged independent artist currently with a constantly improving art style!

Feel free to ask me stuff :P

No art thieves or tracers allowed here!!!

No tagging my art as kin/me unless I say otherwise!!!

This blog is safe for all genders, religions, and races!!!

NO REPOSTING ALLOWED UNLESS YOU TAG/CREDIT ME AND ASK MY PERMISSION FIRST!!!!!

Reblogs, Likes, Ask, and Comments are appreciated!!! :3

tags: i dont even remember all the tags i used before
summary: I did dragon doodleson my nametag for one of my classes :3 i made em all up except for the Imperial on the top right. So far i...
body: I did dragon doodleson my nametag for one of my classes :3 i made em all up except for the Imperial on the top right. So far i got two named species of Gremmilgyle and Frilled-Boghorn. I’m still thinking on a species name for the top left fuzzy one. So I guess this is a good start for rebooting this blog X3 enjoy my doodles i guess, the three i made are closed right now, especially since i dont have full body drawings made yet.

blog.name: kolajmag
blog.title: Kolaj Magazine
blog.description: a quarterly, printed magazine about contemporary collage.

summary: COLLAGE ON VIEW Facades Evelyn Davis-Walker & Steven S. Walker at the Thomas University Art Gallery in Thomasville, Georgia, USA...
caption:
COLLAGE ON VIEW

Facades

Evelyn Davis-Walker & Steven S. Walker at the Thomas University Art Gallery in Thomasville, Georgia, USA through 4 October 2018. A collaborative series by spouses, the series examines the societal rules and taboos of the 1950s. A person’s identity is directly tied to appearances and impressions–whether their physical appearance to their inner circle of friends, or that of the house they “kept” and its appearance within their community. The concept of facades contributes greatly to the overall message of this series. MORE

Kolaj Magazine is the world’s only internationally-oriented art magazine dedicated to contemporary collage.

Are you getting Kolaj Magazine delivered to your door? Subscribe Today!
U.S. & International Subscribers go HERE | Canadian Subscribers go HERE
